input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Carolina Pine Garland"
Reference Product Description:
This Carolina Pine garland features mixed bristle and cashmere branch tips and is trimmed with pine cones. It is pre-strung with 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This indoor, outdoor garland can be displayed over doors, windows, fireplace mantels, fence or stairway railings.

Designed with a Norwood Fir branch base, this pre-lit artificial Christmas garland is 9 feet long and decorated with pine cones.
Features 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
Suitable as an indoor or outdoor Christmas decoration, drape this garland over any door, window or entryway to add a festive feel to any area of the house.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials and hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this garland is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='18' Pre-Lit Battery Operated Sparkling Artificial Christmas Garland with Warm White LED Lights'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 115'' in. Lighted Faux No Plant Species Garland'
  - Name='Northlight 18' Pre-Lit Pine Two-tone Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Ashland Bulk 8 Pack 6Ft Greenery Garland'
  - Name='9 Ft National Tree Company Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Garland, Green, Carolina Pine, White Lights, Decorated with Pine Cones, Battery Operated,'
  - Name='Nearly Natural Aberdeen Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree with 500 Clear LED Lights, Pine Cones and Red Berries'
  - Name='Northlight Ashcroft 6' Pre-Lit Cashmere Mixed Pine Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Nearly Natural West Virginia Full Bodied Mixed Pine Artificial Christmas Tree Clear LED Lights and Pine Cones'
  - Name='Puleo International Decorated Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Gerson International Monaco Pine Pre-Lit LED Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Gerson Company 4 ft. Pre-Lit Mixed Pine Lantern Pole Porch Tree'
  - Name='Northlight 18' Pre-Lit Pine Two-tone Artificial Christmas Garland'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 18' Pre-Lit Battery Operated Sparkling Artificial Christmas Garland with Warm White LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Also a pre-lit battery-operated artificial Christmas garland with warm white LED lights, similar function and use, but length and specific branch type not specified.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 115'' in. Lighted Faux No Plant Species Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Lighted garland similar in size and function, but no specific plant species mentioned and no detail on lights type or battery operation.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 18' Pre-Lit Pine Two-tone Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit pine garland with similar lighting and vine type, longer length, but no mention of pine cones or cashmere branch tips.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 18' Pre-Lit Pine Two-tone Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit pine garland with similar lighting and vine type, longer length, but no mention of pine cones or cashmere branch tips.
Greenery garland but sold in bulk, no mention of lighting or pine elements, likely intended for a different use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 9 Ft National Tree Company Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Garland, Green, Carolina Pine, White Lights, Decorated with Pine Cones, Battery Operated,
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Identical product by same brand, same length, pre-lit with battery operated white lights, Carolina Pine with pine cones.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural Aberdeen Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree with 500 Clear LED Lights, Pine Cones and Red Berries
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial Christmas tree rather than a garland, different product type and silhouette despite some shared decorations.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Ashcroft 6' Pre-Lit Cashmere Mixed Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit cashmere mixed pine garland similar to reference's branch tips, but shorter length and no info on cones or battery operation.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural West Virginia Full Bodied Mixed Pine Artificial Christmas Tree Clear LED Lights and Pine Cones
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Another artificial tree rather than garland, different silhouette and use despite some common decoration elements.
Decorated Christmas garland likely similar function, but lacking detail on lighting, branch types, or battery operation.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Gerson International Monaco Pine Pre-Lit LED Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial Christmas tree, not garland; different product category despite being pre-lit pine.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Gerson Company 4 ft. Pre-Lit Mixed Pine Lantern Pole Porch Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Small pre-lit pine decoration shaped as a porch tree, different silhouette, not a garland.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 18' Pre-Lit Pine Two-tone Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Duplicate of earlier Northlight 18' pre-lit pine garland; similar features with some differences from reference garland.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 18' Pre-Lit Pine Two-tone Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Duplicate of earlier Northlight 18' pre-lit pine garland; similar features with some differences from reference garland.
